backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining bond, investment, and user profile types with access-controlled updates and profile queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing navigation-related bond quick-link features with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing high-level summaries of all major frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide describing prerequisites and steps for deploying FUNDGROWTH to the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining color variables, dark mode tokens, and base layout styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router setup using TanStack Router with all defined routes wrapped in a theme provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Auth gate component that restricts content to authenticated users and shows a sign-in prompt otherwise.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Sign‑in/sign‑out button wired to Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to create a profile and submit required fields.
frontend/src/components/bonds/BondCard.t: Displays a clickable card showing key bond details such as rating, coupon rate, tenure, minimum investment, and risk tags.
frontend/src/components/bonds/BondFilter: Provides UI controls for searching, sorting, and filtering bonds by risk tags.
frontend/src/components/bonds/BondQuickL: Fetches bond listings and renders quick-access links in desktop or mobile formats.
frontend/src/components/bonds/GoldOfferi: Displays a list of predefined gold-backed investment offerings with optional premium tagging.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedBon: Empty placeholder component file with no implemented content.
Defines the app layout including header, footer, routed content, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the footer with navigation links, branding, legal info, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Renders the responsive site header with navigation, auth display, and bond quick links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Wraps Internet Identity login/logout logic and exposes authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useBonds.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching bond listings and individual bond details via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerProfile.ts: Fetches and saves the authenticated user's profile using React Query and the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, and clearing identities via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query hook that fetches the user's portfolio using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, plus utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Implements formatting helpers for currency, dates, tenure, ratings, and risk-tag labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/BondDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed bond information with formatting, loading/error states, and status/risk/repayment labels.
frontend/src/pages/BondsPage.tsx: Shows a filterable and sortable list of bond listings with search, risk tags, and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with validation and static contact info, showing a toast on submit.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the investment dashboard, fetching the user's portfolio and displaying totals, active holdings, and a table of investments.
frontend/src/pages/FAQPage.tsx: Displays a list of frequently asked questions using an accordion layout with answers.
frontend/src/pages/GoldSecuredSeriesPage: Empty placeholder page with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage presenting a hero section, platform features, and calls to action for exploring or learning more.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Explains the platform's four-step investment process with cards and highlights key benefits.
frontend/src/pages/InvestPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page informing users the page doesn't exist and linking back to home.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, retrieving, and clearing URL and session parameters with hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, typography, container settings, and plugins for styling and UI behavior.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including schema version, feature definitions, new requests, and project context for bond quick‑access links.
